We are celebrating 7 years in the App Store!!!

# Custom Alerts and Custom Filter are now available FREE of charge!!!
# Also we have fixed some minor bugs.

Thank you for your support. Our success would not be possible without you.
If you like our app please take a minute to write a review or leave a rating in the App Store.
We will really appreciate this.

We are celebrating 7 years in the App Store!!!

# Custom Alerts and Custom Filter are now available FREE of charge!!!
# Also we have fixed some minor bugs.

Thank you for your support. Our success would not be possible without you.
If you like our app please take a minute to write a review or leave a rating in the App Store.
We will really appreciate this.

We are bringing you the first major update this year!

New cool features:

# Improved UI - added icons in navigation menu.
# Map - Displays major and minor tectonic plates.
# Map - Displays the names of major faults and tectonic plate boundaries.
# Map - Can open a web page about a tectonic plate or a fault.
# Map - When opening an earthquake details from Earthquakes list, shows all the earthquakes.
# Added a vibration alert for iPhone.
# Earthquakes list - updated look and feel.
# Earthquakes list - Added an ability to filter earthquakes by name.
# Improved date option in Custom Filter - you can now select 7, 30, 90 days or a custom period.
# Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

We are bringing you the first major update this year!

New cool features:

# Improved UI - added icons in navigation menu.
# Map - Displays major and minor tectonic plates.
# Map - Displays the names of major faults and tectonic plate boundaries.
# Map - Can open a web page about a tectonic plate or a fault.
# Map - When opening an earthquake details from Earthquakes list, shows all the earthquakes.
# Added a vibration alert for iPhone.
# Earthquakes list - updated look and feel.
# Earthquakes list - Added an ability to filter earthquakes by name.
# Improved date option in Custom Filter - you can now select 7, 30, 90 days or a custom period.
# Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

# Earthquake List - shows the items in three groups.
# Displays number of earthquakes on Map screen.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Earthquake List - shows the items in three groups.
# Displays number of earthquakes on Map screen.
# Minor bug fixes.

Another major update! Please let us know if you like the changes.

# Shows historical earthquakes for the screen centre or for any selected annotation.
# Changed earthquake details screen - now all earthquake info and buttons are displayed on a call-out.
# Added "24 hours" option for the date filter.
# Map screen shows now when the data was last updated.
# Added an ability to refresh earthquakes from the Map screen.
# Map screen - added search by location name.
# Minor bug fixes.

Another major update! Please let us know if you like the changes.

# Shows historical earthquakes for the screen centre or for any selected annotation.
# Changed earthquake details screen - now all earthquake info and buttons are displayed on a call-out.
# Added "24 hours" option for the date filter.
# Map screen shows now when the data was last updated.
# Added an ability to refresh earthquakes from the Map screen.
# Map screen - added search by location name.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Added an option to display last 48 hours of earthquakes.
# Added a count for each section in Earthquake list.
# Minor UI changes and bug fixes.

# Added an option to display last 48 hours of earthquakes.
# Added a count for each section in Earthquake list.
# Minor UI changes and bug fixes.
# Minor bug fixes.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Added support for SSN - Servicio Sismológico Nacional, Mexico.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Added support for SSN - Servicio Sismológico Nacional, Mexico.
# Minor bug fixes.
# Minor bug fixes.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Added an option to sort earthquakes list by number of views.
# Map - shows moment tensors and focal mechanisms on call-outs (where available).
# Better iOS 11 compatibility.
# iPhone X support.
# Changed Twitter and Facebook integration to support iOS 11.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Added an option to sort earthquakes list by number of views.
# Map - shows moment tensors and focal mechanisms on call-outs (where available).
# Better iOS 11 compatibility.
# iPhone X support.
# Changed Twitter and Facebook integration to support iOS 11.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Introducing Watch App.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Introducing Watch App.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Show views count on the earthquakes list.
# Watch app - added refresh button.
# Watch app - added time updated info.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Show views count on the earthquakes list.
# Watch app - added refresh button.
# Watch app - added time updated info.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Introduced support for 13 more earthquake data sources bringing the total number to 21:
CEDC - China Earthquake Data Centre (CN),
CSN - Centro Sismologico Nacional, Universidad de Chile (CL),
ICGC - Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya (CAT),
IGEPN - Instituto Geofisico Escuela Politécnica National (EC),
IGN - National Geographic Institute (ES),
IMO - Icelandic Meteorological Office (IS),
INETER - Instituto Nicaragüense de Estudios Territoriales (NI),
INGV - Istituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia (IT),
IRIS - Incorporated Research Institutions for Seismology,
SED - Swiss Seismological Service (CH),
UOA - University of Athens (GR),
INPRES - Instituto Nacional de Prevención Sísmica (AR),
AEC - Alaska Earthquake Center (USA).

# Added an ability to see duplicate USGS and GFZ reports.
# Improved moment tensors/focal mechanisms generation.
# Added an ability to overwrite default text when posting to Facebook and Twitter.
# Added new data sources to Sources screen in Filter.
# Added support for multiple selection of Sources in Filter.
# Added an option to show duplicate USGS and GFZ reports on the earthquake list.
# Watch App shows distance to an earthquake.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Introduced support for 13 more earthquake data sources bringing the total number to 21:
CEDC - China Earthquake Data Centre (CN),
CSN - Centro Sismologico Nacional, Universidad de Chile (CL),
ICGC - Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya (CAT),
IGEPN - Instituto Geofisico Escuela Politécnica National (EC),

INETER - Instituto Nicaragüense de Estudios Territoriales (NI),

# Added an ability to see duplicate USGS and GFZ reports.
# Improved moment tensors/focal mechanisms generation.
# Added an ability to overwrite default text when posting to Facebook and Twitter.
# Added new data sources to Sources screen in Filter.
# Added support for multiple selection of Sources in Filter.
# Added an option to show duplicate USGS and GFZ reports on the earthquake list.
# Watch App shows distance to an earthquake.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Fixed a crash when showing active volcanoes on the Map.

What's New in 2.5.0:

# Introduced support for 13 more earthquake data sources bringing the total number to 21:
- China Earthquake Data Centre (CEDC),
- Centro Sismologico Nacional, Universidad de Chile (CSN),
- Institut Cartogràfic i Geològic de Catalunya (ICGC),
- Instituto Geofisico Escuela Politécnica National (IGEPN),
- National Geographic Institute (IGN),
- Icelandic Meteorological Office (IMO),
- Instituto Nicaragüense de Estudios Territoriales (INETER),
- Istituto Nazionale di Geofisica e Vulcanologia (INGV),
- Incorporated Research Institutions for Seismology (IRIS),
- Swiss Seismological Service (SED),
- University of Athens (UOA),
- Instituto Nacional de Prevención Sísmica (INPRES),
- Alaska Earthquake Center (AEC).

# Added an ability to see duplicate USGS and GFZ reports.
# Improved moment tensors/focal mechanisms generation.
# Added an ability to overwrite default text when posting to Facebook and Twitter.
# Added new data sources to Sources screen in Filter.
# Added support for multiple selection of Sources in Filter.
# Added an option to show duplicate USGS and GFZ reports on the earthquake list.
# Watch App shows distance to an earthquake.
# Minor bug fixes.

# Fixed a crash when showing active volcanoes on the Map.

# Added an ability to see duplicate USGS and GFZ reports.
# Improved moment tensors/focal mechanisms generation.
# Added an ability to overwrite default text when posting to Facebook and Twitter.
# Added new data sources to Sources screen in Filter.

# Minor bug fixes.

# Fixed a crash on app start for iOS 10 and below.
# Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

# Fixed a crash on app start for iOS 10 and below.
# Minor bug fixes and performance improvements.

Second major release this year.
Introducing Premium Subscription:

# Earthquake timelapse map animation.
# Additional map options:
- Different methods to display earthquakes
(markers, circles, magnitude - depth and circles, magnitude - age).
- Show time as local or UTC/GMT.
- Optionally show an earthquake power in tons of TNT.
- Optionally show earthquake perception radius ring.

# Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Fixed push notification issue for iOS 13.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

# We managed to miss a couple of little, harmless bugs.
# Caught them now, enjoy!
# Fixed invalid dates in Favorites.

Fixed push notification issue for iOS 13.
Minor bug fixes and enhancements.

# We managed to miss a couple of little, harmless bugs.
# Caught them now, enjoy!

Thank you for your tremendous support!

Introducing 3D map as a part of Premium Subscription.
All map features are now available on a globe.

More features:
# 3D map time-lapse.
# Optionally shows damage rings on map.
# Shows country for the earthquakes.
# Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you for your tremendous support!

Introducing 3D map as a part of Premium Subscription.
All map features are now available on a globe.

More features:
# 3D map time-lapse.
# Optionally shows damage rings on map.
# Shows country for the earthquakes.
# Minor bug fixes and improvements.

# Added auto refresh if list is older than 10 minutes,
# Added History button on 3D Map,
# Added markers' appearance animation on 3D Map,
# Minor bug fixes and improvements.

What's new in 3.0.0:

Introducing 3D map as a part of Premium Subscription.
All map features are now available on a globe.

More features:
# 3D map time-lapse.
# Optionally shows damage rings on map.
# Shows country for the earthquakes.
# Minor bug fixes and improvements.

# Added auto refresh if list is older than 10 minutes,

# We managed to miss a couple of little, harmless bugs.
# Caught them now, enjoy!

# We managed to miss a couple of little, harmless bugs.

# Added ability to change background for 3D map (Premium version),
# Can optionally display moment tensors on the map (Premium version),
# Added missing symbols to Map Legend,
# When searching in the Earthquakes List for location, searches in data source names as well,
# Added “Next/Previous” buttons for onboarding screens,
# Added legal and attribution screen to About box,
# Add “Other” to sharing options,
# Allow Earthquakes List to get sorted in ascending and descending order,
# Added new Seismology Information screen,
# Added “Tell a friend” screen.

Minor bug fixes and improvements.

Thank you all for you tremendous support!
We are proud to release our next major release this year. Enjoy!

# PREMIUM - new option to change the default playback speed when animating a map.
# PREMIUM - during map animation, use a slider to find the required date and time.
# PREMIUM - in addition to standard, satellite and hybrid maps, use one of 7 new base maps:
- Topographic,
- Shaded Relief Map,
- Physical Map,
- Terrain Map,
- Ocean Bathymetry,
- Population density,
- City Lights.
# Information screen - added "Be prepared" info.
# Sort By screen and Earthquake List now show sorting direction.
# Improved Facebook integration.
# The app can now open Earthquake+ web links shared by other users.

Minor bug fixes and improvements.

If you have any suggestions - please let us know!
